solution_line_template: Wanda brought {wanda_bread} pieces of bread, three times the number of treats, so Wanda brought {wanda_bread}/{wanda_bread_to_treats_ratio} = <<{wanda_bread}/{wanda_bread_to_treats_ratio}={wanda_treats}>>{wanda_treats} treats.
Wanda brought half as many treats as Jane, which means Jane brought {wanda_treats}*{wanda_to_jane_treats_ratio} = <<{wanda_treats}*{wanda_to_jane_treats_ratio}={jane_treats}>>{jane_treats} treats.
The total number of pieces of bread Jane brought is 75% of the number of treats, which means Jane brought {jane_bread_fraction} * {jane_treats} = {jane_bread} pieces of bread.

Wanda and Jane brought a total of {wanda_treats} treats+{jane_treats} treats+{jane_bread} pieces of bread + {wanda_bread} pieces of bread = <<{wanda_treats}+{jane_treats}+{jane_bread}+{wanda_bread}={total}>>{total}
